decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to quickly establish board presence and apply pressure on the opponent through a combination of low-cost spells, efficient creatures, and counterspells. With a mix of flash creatures like Spectral Sailor and Brineborn Cutthroat, as well as powerful creatures like Nightpack Ambusher, the deck aims to generate tempo advantage and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The inclusion of Fabled Passage and Castle Vantress provides additional utility and consistency, while cards like Quench and Negate help protect your threats and counter opposing spells.

This deck focuses on using gates to control the board and generate value with cards like Gates Ablaze and Guild Summit. Golos, Tireless Pilgrim helps to find essential lands like Field of the Dead, while Teferi, Time Raveler provides disruption and card advantage. The deck also includes powerful finishers like Hydroid Krasis and Agent of Treachery. By mana ramping with Growth Spiral and Circuitous Route, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a late-game army of zombies and an assortment of powerful gate-related abilities.

The main focus of this Golgari Aggro deck is to quickly put pressure on the opponent with aggressive creatures like Rotting Regisaur, Spawn of Mayhem, and Questing Beast, while also ramping up with cards like Paradise Druid to play powerful threats like The Great Henge. The deck aims to maintain board presence and hit hard and fast before the opponent can stabilize or deal with the creatures efficiently. Utilizing the Golgari color combination allows for a mix of strong creatures and removal spells to control the game and overwhelm the opponent.

The main concept of this deck is to create a fast and aggressive playstyle using Gruul Aggro cards. The deck focuses on utilizing cards like Domri, Anarch of Bolas, Bonecrusher Giant, Gruul Spellbreaker, and Robber of the Rich to quickly deal damage to the opponent. It also includes cards like Pelt Collector and Questing Beast to reinforce the aggressive strategy. With a combination of burn spells like Shock and creatures with haste, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and finish the game before they have a chance to establish a strong defense.

This deck focuses on controlling the game by using removal spells like Murderous Rider and Kaya's Wrath to eliminate threats, while also utilizing cards like Teferi, Time Raveler to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck also utilizes cards like Guild Globe and Golden Egg for card draw and mana fixing. The end goal is to outlast the opponent by slowly grinding them out of resources until the player can take control of the game and secure the win, often through the powerful late-game spell Dance of the Manse.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly establish a board presence and overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures such as Hydroid Krasis and Cavalier of Thorns. The deck focuses on ramping up mana with cards like Nissa, Who Shakes the World and Leafkin Druid to bring out big threats early in the game. Cards like Quasiduplicate and Agent of Treachery provide additional value and disruption to control the game. Tamiyo, Collector of Tales helps with card advantage and graveyard recursion, while Growth Spiral assists with ramping and card draw.

The main focus of this deck is to aggressively control the board and tempo using counterspells and flash creatures, while also putting pressure on the opponent with a mix of evasive threats and pump spells. The deck aims to quickly establish a board presence and protect it with counter magic, while also generating card advantage and maintaining flexibility through card selection and tutoring effects. By combining strong tempo plays with disruptive elements, the deck aims to outmaneuver and overwhelm the opponent in order to secure a swift victory.

The main concept of this Sultai Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast and aggressive creatures while also maintaining control over the board with counterspells and removal spells. The deck focuses on utilizing powerful creatures like Nightpack Ambusher and Lochmere Serpent to pressure the opponent, while also having the flexibility to disrupt their strategies with cards like Tyrant's Scorn and Frilled Mystic. The deck's mana base is carefully constructed to ensure consistency and smooth mana curve, allowing for efficient plays and strong tempo advantage.

The deck focuses on utilizing Fires of Invention to cast powerful spells without tapping mana, enabling control over the game through powerful planeswalkers like Nicol Bolas, Dragon-God, and Liliana, Dreadhorde General. The deck also includes cards like Narset, Parter of Veils and Thought Erasure to disrupt the opponent's game plan and Fae of Wishes to access a versatile sideboard. The deck's mana base supports the multiple colors needed for its spells, providing consistency in casting its powerful threats and disruptive spells.

This deck focuses on utilizing the graveyard as a resource to bring back powerful creatures like Drakuseth, Maw of Flames and Agent of Treachery with cards like Blood for Bones and Bond of Revival. The deck also contains a decent amount of card draw and looting effects to help find combo pieces or dig for answers. Additionally, cards like Improbable Alliance and Tomebound Lich provide additional value and threats on the battlefield. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and card advantage to secure victory.

The main focus of this mono black aggro deck is to apply early pressure on your opponent with efficient creatures like Knight of the Ebon Legion and Gutterbones. This is further supported by cards like Yarok's Fenlurker and Priest of Forgotten Gods, which disrupt your opponent's hand and gain value through sacrificing creatures. The deck also includes powerful finishers like Rankle, Master of Pranks and Spawn of Mayhem to close out games quickly. The overall strategy revolves around maintaining a fast and aggressive tempo while grinding down your opponent's resources.

The deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana with cards like Gilded Goose and Paradise Druid to play powerful threats like Oko, Thief of Crowns and Hydroid Krasis early in the game. Feasting Troll King serves as a big finisher, while Wicked Wolf and Cavalier of Thorns provide additional value and board presence. The deck aims to apply pressure on the opponent consistently and efficiently, utilizing cards like Once Upon a Time and Golden Egg for card advantage and consistency. The mana base of the deck is built around green sources to support its ramp strategy.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana and cast powerful creatures to overwhelm the opponent. The deck utilizes mana dorks like Gilded Goose and Paradise Druid to accelerate into powerful threats such as Oko, Thief of Crowns and Nissa, Who Shakes the World. Additionally, the deck includes synergistic cards like Nightpack Ambusher and Voracious Hydra to maintain pressure on the opponent and close out the game swiftly. Overall, the deck aims to establish board presence early and snowball into a dominant position to secure victory.

The main concept of this Sultai Aggro deck is to quickly establish a board presence with efficient creatures like Knight of the Ebon Legion and Stonecoil Serpent, while disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Legion's End and Assassin's Trophy. The deck also includes powerful planeswalkers like Oko, Thief of Crowns and Vraska, Golgari Queen to provide additional value and control the battlefield. The goal is to apply pressure on the opponent early and maintain a strong board presence throughout the game to secure a quick victory.

The deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy through a combination of removal spells and hand disruption. It also aims to gain card advantage and generate value through cards like Hydroid Krasis and Savvy Hunter. The deck includes a variety of powerful planeswalkers like Oko, Thief of Crowns and Vraska, Golgari Queen to generate incremental advantage and control the board. The mana base is designed to support the deck's three-color requirements while also allowing for consistent access to all its spells.

The main concept of the deck is to quickly establish a board presence with aggressive creatures like Thunderkin Awakener, Cloudkin Seer, and Risen Reef while utilizing Neoform to search for key creatures like Omnath, Locus of the Roil. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of card advantage and tempo plays, supported by powerful removal cards like Lava Coil and Shock. By efficiently ramping up mana with cards like Leafkin Druid and utilizing the elemental synergy in Temur colors, the deck seeks to outpace and outvalue the opponent in Standard 1 vs 1 matchups.
